definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: a bird (with harsh, strident note ? Bo:Heroz, ii. 284; ed. Rosenm. iii. 29, Tristr:NHB 192 think of [[נֶשֶׁף]]—i.e. a twilight bird; on format. cf. Lag:BN 127 Ba:NB 231);—unclean Le 11:17, De 14:16; inhabiting deserts Is 34:11. Prob. a kind of owl Bo:l.c., ‘Great Owl,’ Egyptian Eagle-owl (bubo ascalaphus) Tristr:l.c. cf. SyrVer Targum Di Dr - White:Hpt (Lv), > LXX. Vulgate Lv Is ibis.
